reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bungalows are set off the road dotted around a garden area, less than 2 minute walk from the beautiful beach. For 500 BHT a night we got a very pleasant and clean bungalow with an excellent fan and a large bed. Wifi was included. The little porch outside had a hammock and the area was nice and peaceful. There is a decent selection of bars and restaurants within a few minutes walk.
reviews.title: Clean, pleasant bungalows and good value too.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked Sandee Bungalows for five nights and I would say that they were very cheap (500 baht per night). However when we arrived although the bungalow was clean, it was very small and extremely claustrophobic as all varnished on the inside. Also the entire bungalow smelt like a men’s toilets, so much so we decided not to stay and found accommodation just up the road which we absolutely loved. In our brief encounter with Sandee Bungalow we found the reception lady to be pleasant but the location is quite poor as it is essentially in the entrance of another very large plush resort and quite near the road. All in all an adequate place to stay if you are a student or proper backpacker, not so good otherwise but you obviously get what you pay for!
reviews.title: Really unpleasant little bungalows, badly located

reviews.text: This is a superb spot if you want to get away. The bungalow was clean with a clean tiled bathroom. I stayed in 8 & it was nice & quiet. There were tropical flowers all over , a hammock in which to hand & read, & many lovely large butterflies floating around. The owner was fine, helpful & there is free wifi there. In the afternoon, a guy comes with a crepe cart & makes some killer crepes right outside of Sandee's. You can also walk to Bottle Beach from there, but I suggest you hitch out on a local motor boat. Really enjoyed my time there in Surat Thani. Thanks.
reviews.title: SANDEE BUNGALOW WAS SUPER-PEACEFUL
